detail_desc: Knee-length skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High, elasticated waist and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a chiffon crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and tiered flounces. Satin underskirt.

Short nightslip in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined lace cups, an opening with a button at the back, and short slits at the sides of the hem.

Swim top and swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Short, fitted skirt in glittery stretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, gathers at one side and an asymmetric hem. Concealed elastication at the waist. Partly lined.

Shirt in soft cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in soft cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit in textured fabric with a large decorative bow at the top. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Vest top and a pair of sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Vest top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long earrings in plastic and metal with fabric tassels at the ends. Length 17.5 cm.
USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 6/7/8 PLUS/X. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.

Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and raglan sleeves with contrasting colour mesh stripes down the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.

Off-the-shoulder top in an airy weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps and a flounced trim at the top, a concealed zip at the back and an elasticated hem. Long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Partly lined.

Playsuit in sequin-embroidered mesh with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long, wide sleeves. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication, and wide legs. Scalloped edges around the neckline, sleeves and hems. Lined.
